issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: euca-describe-snapshots should not add other request parameters when an identifier is specified

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: euca-describe-snapshots does not support verbose parameter

comments.body: This is a regression in 4.1, but there is a work-around which is to use the "-a" option.

The related tools issue ( TOOLS-547 ) means you may not see the expected behaviour when testing via euca2ools. To verify this issue while working around the tools issue you can run euca-describe-snapshots with both the "-a" and "verbose" options.

Verified.

{noformat}
